thread.title: Victoria Beckham shares unseen throwback of sons on Cruz’s 12th birthday
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham shares unseen throwback of sons on Cruz’s 12th birthday

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Victoria Beckham shares unseen throwback of sons on Cruz’s 12th birthday
text:
Victoria Beckham shares unseen throwback of sons on Cruz’s 12th birthday The mum of four posted a sweet message for son Cruz to mark his birthday Share Victoria Beckham shares throwback picture of her boys (Photo: Instagram) Share Get   
With his burgeoning music career, it’s hard to believe that Cruz Beckham is only 12 years old. 
But today, on his last birthday before he becomes a teenager, Cruz’s famous mum Victoria took to Instagram with a touching tribute for her youngest son. 
The mum of four shared a photo of Cruz as a baby with his brothers Brooklyn and Romeo, now 14. 
All wearing white shirts and jeans – the brothers look pleased as punch in the candid snap. 
“Happy birthday Cruz!! We all love u so much,” the proud mum commented on the photo shared with her 13.8m followers. 
Meanwhile, his dad David Beckham posted a gushing tribute to son. 
The former footballer took to Instagram to share a lengthy post about his third son, whom he describes as the “cheekiest” member of the Beckham family with the biggest heart. 
“He may be the cheekiest but this little man has the biggest heart and sweetest nature and any dad would be proud to have that in his son,” wrote David. 
“At 12 years old he brings a smile and joy into the house from the moment he opens his eyes till the moment he falls asleep which normally means 8:30pm ( but we all know that means 9:30 right CRUZ. Anyway Happy birthday little man x love you.” David and son Cruz David with the kids in New York on February 12 (Photo: Rex) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
